description:
Presentation design and delivery expert and best-selling author Garr Reynolds shows you how to create provocative presentations with solid designs and Zen principles. In this intimate one-on-one video, Garr delves deeper on his ideas from his popular book, Presentation Zen, and blog, presentationzen.com, and challenges viewers to go beyond the conventional presentation style. Garr inspires you to think creatively and strive for simpler, more effective presentations.

Presentation Zen has won numerous awards, most recently a CINE Golden Eagle Award and a a Silver Telly Award.
title: Presentation Zen
